fields.title: Event Operations Manager
fields.description: Lead the setup, coordination, and smooth running of all live events and workshops.
fields.requirements:
• 3+ years operations experience
  • Team leadership
  • Strong time management

fields.title: Client Success Specialist
fields.description: Support our partners and clients before, during, and after their events to maximize satisfaction.

fields.title: Corporate Sales Lead
fields.description: Target corporate clients for large-scale bookings, custom workshops, and brand partnerships.
fields.requirements:
• B2B sales experience
  • Network in corporate sector
  • Confident presenter

fields.title: Finance & Payroll Officer
fields.description: Process payroll, handle monthly reconciliations, and ensure all financial records are up to date.
fields.requirements:
• Bookkeeping or accounting diploma
  • Experience with Xero/Sage
  • Attention to detail

fields.title: Logistics Coordinator
fields.description: Ensure all equipment, supplies, and people are in the right place at the right time for every event.

fields.title: Graphic Designer
fields.description: Create event branding, digital assets, flyers, and social media graphics for marketing and events.
fields.requirements:
• Portfolio of design work
  • Adobe Suite
  • Attention to visual detail

fields.title: Photographer/Videographer
fields.description: Capture live moments and create highlight reels of events for marketing and internal use.
fields.requirements:
• Own camera gear
  • Event experience
  • Fast delivery of edited work

fields.title: Digital Content Creator
fields.description: Write, design, and film engaging content for web, email, and social platforms.

fields.title: Legal & Compliance Officer
fields.description: Ensure contracts, safety, and employment regulations are met for all company activities.

fields.title: Social Media Manager
fields.description: Plan and execute campaigns on Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, and LinkedIn for Debaren and TBAE.
fields.requirements:
• Campaign examples
  • Experience with paid ads
  • Trendy and creative

fields.title: HR Administrator
fields.description: Support hiring, onboarding, employee well-being, and HR records.

fields.title: Workshop Facilitator
fields.description: Lead interactive workshops and activities for clients in-person and virtually.

fields.title: Technical Support Specialist
fields.description: Provide support for our platforms and help clients troubleshoot issues with event portals.

fields.title: Account Manager
fields.description: Maintain long-term client relationships and upsell new solutions.

fields.title: SEO & Analytics Lead
fields.description: Boost search engine visibility and track campaign performance.

fields.title: Procurement Specialist
fields.description: Negotiate and purchase materials, catering, and event-related services.

fields.title: CRM & Email Marketing Specialist
fields.description: Set up campaigns, manage contacts, and monitor open rates in Mailchimp or similar tools.

fields.title: Quality Assurance Manager
fields.description: Test, review, and ensure high quality across all services and user journeys.

fields.title: Mobile App Developer
fields.description: Build and maintain mobile apps for event bookings and communication.

fields.title: Partnerships & Sponsorships Lead
fields.description: Formulate strategies and attract sponsors for high-profile events and campaigns.

fields.title: Community Support Officer
fields.description: Engage with users, respond to queries, and build relationships online and offline.

fields.title: Junior Event Planner
fields.description: Assist with planning, vendor coordination, and event day logistics for small and large events.

fields.title: Catering Manager
fields.description: Oversee food and beverage operations for events, manage vendors and hygiene compliance.
fields.requirements:
• Catering or F&B experience
  • Vendor management
  • Health & safety knowledge

fields.title: Facilities & Venue Manager
fields.description: Maintain venue readiness, coordinate repairs, and ensure excellent customer experiences.

fields.title: Creative Copywriter
fields.description: Write persuasive marketing content, social captions, and long-form articles.

fields.title: Event MC/Presenter
fields.description: Host team building events, ensuring energy and participation from start to finish.

fields.title: IT Support Technician
fields.description: Support staff with hardware, software, and network issues at venues and offices.

fields.title: Brand Designer
fields.description: Design logos, color palettes, and brand guides for company projects and partners.

fields.title: Project Manager
fields.description: Coordinate cross-functional teams and manage project delivery from start to finish.

fields.title: Safety & Risk Officer
fields.description: Assess event risk and ensure compliance with all safety protocols at venues.

fields.title: Business Development Lead
fields.description: Identify growth opportunities, new markets, and strategic partners.

fields.title: Customer Onboarding Specialist
fields.description: Help new clients get started, training them to use the platform and services.

fields.title: Event Billing Administrator
fields.description: Process event payments, send invoices, and track receipts.

fields.title: Sponsorship Coordinator
fields.description: Support the Partnerships team in finding and nurturing sponsorships for events.

fields.title: Market Research Analyst
fields.description: Gather and analyze industry trends, competitor activity, and customer feedback.

fields.title: User Experience (UX) Researcher
fields.description: Conduct user interviews, usability tests, and surveys to improve our platforms.

fields.title: Data Entry Clerk
fields.description: Enter, review, and update large volumes of information with accuracy and speed.

fields.title: Accounts Receivable Clerk
fields.description: Follow up on invoices, reconcile payments, and maintain financial records.

fields.title: Sustainability Officer
fields.description: Drive green initiatives and ensure eco-friendly best practices in all operations.

fields.title: Internal Communications Lead
fields.description: Keep staff updated and motivated with newsletters, Slack, and team meetings.
fields.requirements:
• Excellent writing
  • Internal comms experience
  • Empathy for team needs

fields.title: Video Editor
fields.description: Edit event footage and create compelling video content for social, ads, and web.

fields.title: Chief Technology Officer (CTO)
fields.description: Oversee all technical direction, lead development teams, and shape the tech strategy for growth.

fields.title: Event Setup Crew
fields.description: Help physically set up and break down event spaces, signage, and activities.

fields.title: Workshop Content Developer
fields.description: Design workshop materials, guides, and activities for our facilitators.

fields.title: Travel & Bookings Coordinator
fields.description: Book venues, flights, and accommodations for traveling staff and clients.
fields.requirements:
• Travel agency or bookings background
  • Strong admin
  • Attention to detail
